section.25: The Office of the Judge (Kitab Al-Aqdiyah)

hadiths.text: Amr bin Shu'aib on his father's authority said that his grandfather told that the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) decided regarding the stream al-Mahzur that its water should be held back till it reached the ankles, and that the upper waters should then be allowed to flow to the lower
